questions.question: Q1.In blanking operation, the angle of shear is provided on:

answers.d: Depends on the material of the work piece

explanations.a: Providing shear on die is uncommon in blanking.
explanations.b: Shear is usually provided on the punch to reduce cutting force.
explanations.c: Shear is generally not provided on both.
explanations.d: Material does not 결정 where shear is applied.

questions.question: Q2.Which of the following operation is not a drawing process:

explanations.a: Bulging is a sheet metal forming process.
explanations.c: Lancing is a cutting operation, not drawing.

questions.question: Q3.The thickness of sheet metal is referred to as its _______:

explanations.b: Sheet thickness is represented using gauge number.
explanations.c: Decimal form is not used as a standard reference.

questions.question: Q4.Two or more operations are performed at one station of the press in every stroke of the ram in:

explanations.a: Simple die performs only one operation.
explanations.b: Compound die performs multiple cutting operations at one station.
explanations.c: Combination die involves cutting and forming.

questions.question: Q5.The size of a press is specified by:

answers.b: Size of the workpiece it can handle
answers.c: Maximum load that can be applied to the workpiece
answers.d: Power required to operate the machine

explanations.a: Weight is not a sizing criterion.
explanations.c: Press size is defined by its maximum load capacity.
explanations.d: Power requirement is not used for sizing.

answers.a: Two or more cutting operations at one station of the process
answers.b: Both cutting and non-cutting operations at one station of the process
answers.c: Two or more operations at different stations of the press
answers.d: Only one operation at each stroke of the ram

explanations.c: Progressive die performs operations at multiple stations.

questions.question: Q7.In piercing and blanking operation, the clearance between punch and the die solely depends on:

answers.c: Number of pieces to be made
answers.d: Capacity of the type of press

explanations.a: Hole size does not decide clearance.
explanations.b: Clearance is based on sheet thickness.
explanations.d: Press capacity does not affect clearance.

questions.question: Q8.Which line/axis in the metal is neither compressed nor stretched:

explanations.a: Central axis is not the correct term here.
explanations.b: Middle line may change during deformation.
explanations.c: Neutral axis remains unstressed during bending.

questions.question: Q9.The process of cutting a flat sheet to the desired shape is known as:

explanations.a: Blanking produces the desired external shape.

questions.question: Q10.A sheet metal is being cut along its length in a straight line. Such an operation is called:

explanations.d: Slitting cuts sheet metal along a straight line.
